ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re:Summoning Mobs
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting - I never heard about Vox doing that (but I only fought Vox about three or four times before hitting 53).  I wonder if it s a Dragon thing; I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting - I never heard about Vox doing that (but I only fought Vox
about three or four times before hitting 53). I wonder if it's a "Dragon"
thing; I've fought MANY summoning creatures; particularly fear kiting in
Skyfire - was doing Chants - possibly doing more damage than a Ranger - who
kept on getting Summoned...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: A. S. [mailto:solane@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2001 1:31 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re:Summoning Mobs


> I think the summoning rule is different in Velious than Kunark and
> Old World

I would beg to differ, just because of one of my most spectactular
deaths--at Vox's lair, during my first Vox raid. We had a buggy IG that
warped most of the way back to her lair, and then started summoning. I
had not done melee damage or non-melee damage, or anything...all I was
